mapper.select: select id from b_ord_main where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT mould_nm FROM b_ord_main WHERE
ifnull(is_out, '') != '1'
select quantity from b_ord_main where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update b_ord_main set lot_no = #{lotNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},cust = #{cust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},mould_nm = #{mouldNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},dispatch_no = #{dispatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},buy_material = #{buyMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, kaipiao_time = #{kaipiaoTime,jdbcType=DATE},bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},gongshi = #{gongshi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, out_no = #{outNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},ware_no = #{wareNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update b_ord_main set ord_sts = 'A1', is_ware = '1' where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update b_ord_main set is_out = '1' where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: update b_ord_main set flag = 'N' where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (ord_sts = 'A' or ord_sts = 'B')
mapper.select: select *,(case when ord_sts='A' then '已录入'when ord_sts='A1' then '已入库' when ord_sts='B' then '已预估成本' when ord_sts='C' then '已拆单' end) sts from b_ord_main where ifnull(flag,'') != 'N' and ifnull(is_out,'') != '1' order by lot_no desc

select *,(case when ord_sts='A' then '已录入'when ord_sts='A1' then '已入库' when ord_sts='B' then '已预估成本' when ord_sts='C' then '已拆单' end) sts from b_ord_main where ifnull(flag,'') != 'N' order by lot_no desc

select *,(case when ord_sts='A' then '已录入'when ord_sts='A1' then '已入库' when ord_sts='B' then '已预估成本' when ord_sts='C' then '已拆单' end) sts from b_ord_main where ifnull(flag,'') != 'N' and is_out = '1' and ord_sts = 'A1'

select *,(case when ord_sts='A' then '已录入'when ord_sts='A1' then '已入库' when ord_sts='B' then '已预估成本' when ord_sts='C' then '已拆单' end) sts from b_ord_main where ifnull(flag,'') != 'N' and shuxing = '铸造'

select *,(case when ord_sts='A' then '已录入'when ord_sts='A1' then '已入库' when ord_sts='B' then '已预估成本' when ord_sts='C' then '已拆单' end) sts from b_ord_main where ifnull(flag,'') != 'N' and ord_sts = 'D'
select * from b_ord_main where ord_sts = 'A1'or ord_sts ='B' and ifnull(flag,'') != 'N'
select * from b_ord_main where ord_sts = 'A1'or ord_sts ='B' and mould_nm like #{pattern1} and ifnull(flag,'') != 'N'
select * from b_ord_main where cust like #{pattern} and mould_nm like #{pattern1} and ifnull(flag,'') != 'N' and is_out = '1' and ord_sts= 'A1'

select * from b_ord_main where ifnull(lot_no,'') like concat ('%',#{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and ifnull(cust,'') like concat ('%',#{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and ifnull(dispatchNo,'') like concat ('%',#{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and ifnull(flag,'') != 'N'
